entities.name: Design for Deconstruction (DfD)
entities.evidence_excerpt: Deconstruction is the careful, piece‑by‑piece disassembly of buildings. Deconstruction of a building is also known as selective demolition or disassembly.

entities.name: Building Deconstruction
entities.evidence_excerpt: Deconstruction is the careful, piece‑by‑piece disassembly of buildings. The main goal is to maximise the potential reuse and recovery of a building's components and materials.

entities.evidence_excerpt: The benefits of conducting deconstruction processes outweigh the costs so long as the value of the building component is preserved when it reaches its end‑of‑life.
